entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
